episodes.title: Exposing the Secrets of Prophet TB Joshua's Christian Cult
episodes.description:
The Synagogue Church of All Nations (SCOAN), is a hugely successful evangelical church with headquarters in Lagos Nigeria.  Its founder, Temitope Balogun Joshua established the organization in the late 80’s, and would go on to found one of the most recognizable and influential evangelical churches in Africa, that boasts millions of members across the globe. Joshua was known for his charisma, kindness and humor but after his death in 2021, accusations of years of abuse, torture, and corruption rose to the surface and people are demanding answers. 

My name is Callista McMaye and I share stories of African mysteries and true crime. 

If you want to hear more stories like this, subscribe to my channel.
